title: when can we buy the elementalist lux?
body:
It said that you can have the skin in this patch , but it's almost a week and I still can't buy it.

come on riot.

replies.body: These big skin release dates are almost always kept secret. I heard some rumors that it would be on the 1st of December, but nothing official as of right now. It will still be released on 6.23 for sure though.
